post:
Soaring Servers is a fully managed VPS hosting provider. Started in early 2015 we have quickly grown in the past six to eight months. 

We are extremely happy to be launching our new site and also launching our new and redesigned fully managed VPS servers. We like to keep it short a sweet and get right down to our amazing deal.

-1 GB RAM 

-50 GB SSD Cached

-1 TB Bandwidth

-4 Cores (Shared Equally)

-Location: Phoenix, AZ

-Test IP: 198.15.108.58

Regular Price: $10

LET Exclusive Price: $6 Recurring when you enter in LET6 

Please visit here: https://www.soaringservers.com/billing/cart.php?gid=1


If you have any questions about our services feel free to ask! Before you sign up using our service please read our TOS. Abusive clients will not be tolerated. Failure to read our TOS and follow our simple rules may result in your account being terminated.
